activities: We have employees located in France and Germany.  We send personal information from those countries to the US through email, or it is accessed electronically from the US, for purposes of our human resources People Planning Process, including Personnel Files, Results Review/Performance Appraisal forms, HR reports and organizational charts, and Excel spreadsheets are sent to the US for bonus budgeting and salary increases.
personaldata: The data covered by the Safe Harbor Framework includes employee information, which is manually processed.
